title: [JIT] Unsupported op descriptor index_add
body_html:
Don't support index add in dispatch. Example failure:

======================================================================
ERROR: test_index_add_dim (__main__.TestAutogradGenerated)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3665, in do_test
    check(name)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3587, in check
    check_against_reference(self, create_traced_fn(fn), fn, (self_variable,) + args_variable)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3498, in check_against_reference
    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3446, in traced_fn
    return traced(*inputs_tensors)
RuntimeError: Unsupported op descriptor: index_add-3-dim_i. File a bug report.

Affected tests:

  • test_index_add_dim
  • test_index_add_dim_neg0
  • test_index_add_scalar_all_dim
  • test_index_add_scalar_all_dim_neg0
  • test_index_add_scalar_input_dim
  • test_index_add_scalar_input_dim_neg0

body:
Don't support index add in dispatch. Example failure:

```
======================================================================
ERROR: test_index_add_dim (__main__.TestAutogradGenerated)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3665, in do_test
    check(name)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3587, in check
    check_against_reference(self, create_traced_fn(fn), fn, (self_variable,) + args_variable)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3498, in check_against_reference
    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3446, in traced_fn
    return traced(*inputs_tensors)
RuntimeError: Unsupported op descriptor: index_add-3-dim_i. File a bug report.
```

Affected tests:
- `test_index_add_dim`
- `test_index_add_dim_neg0`
- `test_index_add_scalar_all_dim`
- `test_index_add_scalar_all_dim_neg0`
- `test_index_add_scalar_input_dim`
- `test_index_add_scalar_input_dim_neg0`
